title: Crafting a Lv. 6 and Lv. 7 Champion leaves the crafting VFX looping
body:
I finally got the shards for Lv. 6 Braum, but when I crafted the Lv. 6 the VFX (sound effects) of the crafting animation just keeps looping until you log off. Still got the Lv. 6.
Also, I didn't receive any sort of notification such as: "Congratulations! Etc.. Etc..." I found that pretty disappointing that in the Alpha it didn't appear for me.

replies.body: Those notifications are a work in progress, sorry for the disappointment :( Thanks for resting the alpha and reporting that bug!
